CATRevealRelatedDataHdr.Title: Reveal Related Data
CATRevealRelatedDataHdr.ShortHelp: Lists the data (drawings or layouts) related to selected geometrical objects and previews it in a dedicated viewer.
CATRevealRelatedDataHdr.LongHelp:
1. Select one or several objects.
  2. Click the marker that appears when related data exists.
  3. You can also use the level selector to select an object at a specific level.
